q: purchase 17 self-contained breathing apparatuses, U.S. Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand announced today. The new breathing apparatuses will replace the fire company's 13-year-old air packs, and increase the overall safety of Mottville's 35 volunteer firefighters. It's going to help keep all the firefighters safe so they can enter burning buildings with the latest technology in air packs, Mottville volunteer Fire Chief Tim Baker said. The fire department has applied for the same federal grant for the last six years. Baker said his department needed to replace the aging technology and now the cost

to a league-low 86.7. The Pistons obviously beat them on both ends of the court, with Los Angeles becoming the final NBA team to lose this season. "We just played defense," Allen Iverson said. veteran who had served as CEO of Novell and chief technology officer of Sun Microsystems, Eric Schmidt was brought in to provide some "adult supervision." On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. "I believe Larry is ready" to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."
